title: Horizon Forbidden West - First Hour of Gameplay

transcript_chunks.text: hello gamers welcome back to another gameplay preview this time for horizon forbidden west very excited about this one this is guerrillas follow up to horizon zero dawn super stoked about this let's hop into it i've only played about two minutes worth because i just was testing out some settings so let's start a brand new game let's do it on normal of course explore or guided let's go with the guided assistance i'm pretty notorious for missing the most obvious things on screen let's hop into it everybody playing on performance mode getting the 60 frames i believe it's 1440p oh lots of popping happening i'm not sure if there's any dynamic resolution happening in the background to keep the frame rate target ah dang the lighting looks fantastic i'm running out of time elizabeth the land is dying do you think when they were naming elizabeth they had like a a character limit people are suffering like we just got to leave the h off you know soon all because of a terraforming system that's
